title: ECODIV 2021
text:
Preface
Supervisor: Larmur Annabelle
This project is an extension of the research work carried out by the EcoLeg team, with several publications directly related to this subject, presented below:

title: ECODIV 2021
text:
Vadez et al. (2012)







Guide being written



This guide is still incomplete. The complete repository (documentation, data, script, etc.) will be available shortly at this link: https://github.com/cmaslard/ECODIV_2021.
